Critical.Description:
Não compila: # github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/lifecycle
internal\lifecycle\health.go:523:3: cannot use "port" (untyped string constant) as zap.Field value in argument to hm.logger.Info
internal\lifecycle\h...
Critical.Suggestion: Corrija os erros de compilação listados

Fixability.ManualSteps: Corrija os erros de compilação manualmente, um por um

Examples: # github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/lifecycle
internal\lifecycle\health.go:523:3: cannot use "port" (untyped string constant) as zap.Field value in argument to hm.logger.Info
internal\lifecycle\health.go:523:11: cannot use hm.config.HTTPPort (variable of type int) as zap.Field value in argument to hm.logger.Info
internal\lifecycle\manager.go:195:3: cannot use "component" (untyped string constant) as zap.Field value in argument to lm.logger.Info
internal\lifecycle\manager.go:195:16: cannot use component.Name() (value of type string) as zap.Field value in argument to lm.logger.Info
internal\lifecycle\manager.go:196:3: cannot use "priority" (untyped string constant) as zap.Field value in argument to lm.logger.Info
internal\lifecycle\manager.go:196:15: cannot use component.Priority() (value of type int) as zap.Field value in argument to lm.logger.Info
internal\lifecycle\manager.go:240:3: cannot use "startup_duration" (untyped string constant) as zap.Field value in argument to lm.logger.Info
internal\lifecycle\manager.go:240:23: cannot use time.Since(lm.startTime) (value of int64 type time.Duration) as zap.Field value in argument to lm.logger.Info
internal\lifecycle\manager.go:241:3: cannot use "components_count" (untyped string constant) as zap.Field value in argument to lm.logger.Info

Critical.Suggestion: Adicione verificação de erro: if err != nil { ... }

Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Para cada erro não tratado, decida:
   a) Retornar o erro (wrap com context)
   b) Logar e continuar
   c) Logar e retornar
2. Adicione if err != nil { } manualmente

Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção
